Song.title: Come Now Almighty King
Song.copyright: Lyrics by Martin Maddan Alt. lyrics by Bob Kauflin Music by John Spiro and Bob Kauflin © 2001 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [D2 | D2 | D2 | D2]
VERSE 1: [D2]Come now almighty King, [D2]help us Your name to sing [D2]We will declare Your praise, [D2]righteous in all Your ways [A]Father, all glori[G]ous,{,} [A]o’er all victorio[G]us [A]Come and reign over [Em7]us Ancient of [D2 | D2 | D2 | D2]Days
VERSE 2: [D2]Come now incarnate Word, [D2]take up Your mighty sword [D2]Our humble prayers attend,{,} [D2]faithful unto the end [A]Come and Your people [G]bless, [A]and give Your Word succ[G]ess [A]Lord of all righteous[Em7]ness On us de[D2 | D2 | D2 | D2]scend
{key:E} VERSE 3: [E2]Come Holy Spirit come, [E2]Your perfect will be done [E2]Brighten our darkened hearts, [E2]Your precious life impart. [B2]Guide us into Your [A]truth, [B2]so we might bear more [A]fruit [B2]Fill us with more of [F#m7]You Spirit of [||: E2 | E2 | E2 | E2 :||]power.
{key:F} VERSE 4: [F]To the great [G5/F]one in three,{,} [Ab/F Bb/F ] [F]eternal [G5/F]praises be [Ab/F Bb/F] [F]Timeless, un[G5/F]changing Lord, [Ab/F Bb/F ] [F (break)]now and forevermore [C2]Your sovereign majes[Bb2]ty,{,} [C2]may we in glory [Bb2]see [C2]And to eterni[Gm7]ty Love and a[F2]dore.
